feed.title: Track Awesome Nextjs Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: :notebook_with_decorative_cover: :books: A curated list of awesome resources : books, videos, articles about using Next.js (A minimalistic framework for universal server-rendered React applications)

entry.title: Awesome Nextjs Updates on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022
entry.content:
Community

  • GitHub (‚≠ê133k)
  • GitHub discussions for Next.js (‚≠ê133k)

Essentials

  • Blog
  • Learn
  • Vercel TV
  • Bulletproof Next

Articles

  • Using Next.js with FaunaDB: How to Query the Database from Your App
  • How to Build a Serverless Next.js Blog with ButterCMS
  • Build a Universal JavaScript App with Next.js
  • Getting Started with Next.js ‚Äî Setting Up Your App
  • Getting Started with Next.js ‚Äî Bringing Data In
  • How to build a Next.js React Universal App
  • Next on Next.js
  • Accept payments on your site with nextjs, stripe, and micro
  • Next.js on Cloud Functions for Firebase with Firebase Hosting
  • Building a Blog With Next.js
  • Using Google Analytics with Next.js
  • Build a Universal JavaScript App with Next.js and Redux [Russian]
  • 5 (of the Many Reasons) to love Vercel's Next.js
  • Next.js 5: Universal Webpack, CSS Imports, Plugins and Zones
  • Realtime data visualization using Next.js and Chart.js
  • Build a chat app with sentiment analysis using Next.js
  • Build a realtime table with Next.js
  • SSR blog with Next.js and Prismic.io
  • SEO in Next.js and Prismic
  • SEO in Next.js with next-seo
  • Next.js 7
  • Create SSR Next.js websites using GraphQL with Postgres
  • Cooking a Deliveroo clone with Next.js (React), GraphQL, Strapi and Stripe - Setup (part 1/7)
  • Next.js E-commerce Tutorial: Quick Shopping Cart Integration
  • Working with Ghost and Next.js
  • Using Tailwind CSS with Next.js
  • Using Feature Flags in Next.js
  • Adding code snippets to Next.js using react-syntax-highlighter

Boilerplates

  • Next.js Static Blog - Next.js static blog powered by the Cosmic Headless CMS
  • NextJS Headless CMS Powered Blog Starter (‚≠ê146)
  • Next.js App with AWS Lambda (‚≠ê59) - Deploy a Next.js App to AWS Lambda using Apex Up.
  • Nitro üöÄ (‚≠ê282) - An Example of a PWA using Nextjs, Material-UI, Typescript and Auth0 üíó
  • Next & Now 2.0 Typescript template (‚≠ê43) - Serverless, Typescript, Jest, Github CI, SCSS, prettier boilerplate
  • Next Right Now (‚≠ê1.3k) - Flexible production-grade boilerplate with Next.js 9 and Vercel, with pre-configured Sentry, cookies, Amplitude, Emotion, FontAwesome, GraphQL/GraphCMS (Apollo), Bootstrap (Reactstrap), i18next (Locize), Jest, Cypress (E2E tests) and CI/CD (GH Actions), with full TypeScript support and support for B2B multi-tenants web apps (monorepo)
  • Next Graphql Apollo Typescript_Boostrap - Pobocha (‚≠ê87) - React + GraphQL + Next.js + Apollo + Scss + Typescript + Prettier & EsLint boilerplate
  • Next & Vercel Typescript template (‚≠ê43) - Serverless, Typescript, Jest, Github CI, SCSS, prettier boilerplate
  • NextJS in Firebase with Bootstrap (‚≠ê25) - Hosting NextJS app with Bootstrap in Firebase with Cloud Functions.
  • Next Simple Starter (‚≠ê950) - Simple PWA boilerplate with Next.js and Redux.
  • NextJS Starter (‚≠ê1.4k) - Starter project for Next.js with and email and oAuth authentication.
  • nextjs-starter (‚≠ê453) - An SEO Optimized Next.js 10 starter kit template with React 17 + Typescript + Tailwind CSS 2 + React Query 3 + (GitHub Auth + Passwordless Auth) using (NextAuth.js and Fauna DB), ESLint, Prettier, Pre-commit hook with Husky. Can have different layouts for different pages.
  • RAN! (‚≠ê2.2k) - Production-ready boilerplate with support for GraphQL, SSR, Hot-reload, CSS-in-JS, caching, and more.
  • Next Simple Blog (‚≠ê555) - Simple Markdown based blog built with Next.js with static exports.
  • phox (‚≠ê19) - Create a static photo blog.
  • Next Express Bootstrap Boilerplate (‚≠ê112) - Boilerplate for a full stack app built using Next, Express, react-bootstrap, SCSS and SSR with eslint.
  • Next Blog Firestore (‚≠ê269) - Blog with simple CMS built with Next.js, Firebase Firestore, styled-components and mobx-state-tree.
  • Next Redux Starter (‚≠ê375) - Next.js starter with Express, Redux, and PostCSS.
  • NextJS Redux-Wrapper Material-UI (‚≠ê131) - ü§ì A boilerplate NextJS with Redux and Material UI.
  • Staart (‚≠ê313) - üòé Actively maintained Next.js components library and minimal boilerplate to rapidly get staarted with app with working user accounts based on Ooth.
  • NextJS TypeScript Starter Kit (‚≠ê336) - üéâ TypeScript + NextJS, Styled-jsx, Redux, PostCSS, configurable SEO
  • Next Boilerplate - External CSS and Sass + Importing images from anywhere + Prettier and Eslint + Environment variables and many more features.
  • next-starter (‚≠ê27) - A full and simple boilerplate with sass (.scss) and postcssbuilt in.
  • Typescript Monorepo Next Example (‚≠ê44) - A minimalistic next.js + typescript monorepo.
  • tomimick/tm-nextjs-starter (‚≠ê50) - A minimal starter/demo with basic CRUD, axios/localstorage, MobX, SASS, static site export, live demo
  • csprance/next-smrt (‚≠ê56) - A minimal boilerplate with redux, styled-components, material-ui and typescript with a custom express server.
  • Nextron (‚≠ê4.3k) - An Electron with Next.js apps generator ‚ö°
  • next-boilerplate (‚≠ê1.6k) - A well-structured production ready Next.js boilerplate with Typescript, Redux, Express.js, Sass, Css, EnvConfig, Reverse Proxy, Bundle
  • Oh My Fullstack (‚≠ê174) - Full stack web application skeleton (Next.js, Redux, RxJS, Immutable, Express)
  • Next-Postgres-With-Typescript (‚≠ê20) - Forum-like fullstack web app with Next 7.0.2 + Sequelize 4/Postgres + Typescript + Redux + Passport Local Auth + Emotion
  • Next.js with Express and Babel (‚≠ê3) - An application skeleton for those who want to transpile their Express as well as their Next.js code using Babel.
  • next-postgres-graphql (‚≠ê32k) - Create SSR Next.js websites using GraphQL with Postgres (Next.js, Postgres, GraphQL)
  • nextjs-mongodb-app (‚≠ê1.6k) - Full-fledged app made with Next.JS and MongoDB, with authentication and much more (Next.js 9, MongoDB)
  • react-next-boilerplate (‚≠ê361) - üöÄ A basis for reducing the configuration of your projects with nextJS, best development practices and popular libraries in the developer community.
  • The-Nextjs-starter (‚≠ê22) - typescript + redux + styled-components + react-testing-library + eslint + fontawesome
  • The Knests Stack (‚≠ê348) - Full stack boilerplate/hackathon starter with: PostgreSQL, Knex.js, NestJS, Next.js (obviously), GraphQL, React (with hooks and typescript), Material-UI, Docker multistage images for, Docker compose and a Gitlab CI/CD pipeline fully configured.
  • Devii (‚≠ê497) - A Medium-inspired dev blog starter built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript, with Markdown rendering, syntax highlighting, SEO/meta tags, and RSS feed generation out of the box.
  • Nextjs Blog Starter - üöÄ The perfect starter code for your blog based on Next.js framework. ‚ö°Ô∏è Made with Next.js, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, PostCSS, Tailwind CSS.
  • Next.js and Netlify Blogging Template (‚≠ê467) - A perfect boilerplate for building a blog website on Netlify stacks with standard features like tagging, CMS, and shortcodes.
  • Nextjs Apollo Nexus (‚≠ê3) - GraphQL Apollo Client-Server integration in Next.js with Nexus Schema (Code first approach).
  • Nextjs Starter Peacock (‚≠ê130) - ü¶ö Beautiful Nextjs portfolio starter for software engineers and designers to show work they're so proud of.
  • Nextatic (‚≠ê47) - üåç Static website multi-language boilerplate with user-editable pages and navigation using Netlify CMS + Next.js + SCSS + Typescript.
  • Sitemap generator for NextJS & StrAPI (‚≠ê6) - ü¶æ An additional server on express that runs alongside nextjs and regenerates sitemap ( with index sitemap ) and robots.txt files on request from STR API.
  • superplate (‚≠ê2.9k) - superplate creates Next.js app in seconds with TypeScript, styled-components, SWR, Storybook, and 35+ plugin.

Extensions

  • Next universal language detector (‚≠ê95) - Language detector that works universally (browser + server) - Meant to be used with a universal framework, such as Next.js DEMO
  • Next Routes (‚≠ê2.5k) - Universal named routes for Next.js.
  • Next-Pkg (‚≠ê67) - Extended Next.js server with pkg (‚≠ê24k) support.
  • Next Plugin Graphql (‚≠ê58) - Next.js plugin for .graphql and .gql files using graphql-tag
  • Next With Apollo (‚≠ê766) - Apollo Graphql integration for Next.js
  • Next SEO (‚≠ê8k) - SEO made easy for Next.js
  • Next UserAgent - UserAgent parser for Next.js
  • Next Cookie - Cookie serializer and deserializer library for Next.js.
  • Nextein (‚≠ê897) - A static site generator based in Next.js.
  • next-mdx-blog (‚≠ê74) - Easily add a blog to any next.js based project
  • next-i18next (‚≠ê6k) - The easiest way to translate your NextJs apps.
  • next-routes-middleware (‚≠ê40) - A NextJS routing middleware
  • Serverless Framework plugin for Next.js (‚≠ê4.5k) - Deploy serverless applications with ease.
  • Terraform For Next.js (‚≠ê53) - Deploy your application using Terraform
  • next-session (‚≠ê358) - Session middleware for Next.js
  • next-iron-session (‚≠ê4k) - Next.js stateless session utility using signed and encrypted cookies to store data
  • Next PurgeCSS (‚≠ê137) - Easily integrate Purgecss, which helps you remove unused CSS from your bundle.
  • Next PWA (‚≠ê4k) - Zero config PWA plugin for Next.js with workbox
  • flow-middleware (‚≠ê16) - Run any of Express middlewares on Next.js without polluting native objects.
  • next-connect (‚≠ê1.7k) - The Express/Connect-compatible router and middleware layer for Next.js.
  • next-img (‚≠ê272) - a plugin for embedding optimized images with ease.
  • next-auth (‚≠ê27k) - Easy authentication for Next.js and Serverless
  • next-deploy (‚≠ê49) - üöÄ Effortless deployment to AWS and GitHub Pages.
  • next-joi (‚≠ê111) - Validate Next.js API Routes, with joi.
  • next-transpile-modules (‚≠ê1.1k) - Next.js plugin to transpile code from node_modules. Useful for monorepos.
  • Destack for Next.js (‚≠ê1.8k) - Next.js extension to visually build landing pages locally.

Apps

  • CourseLit (‚≠ê823) - An open source alternative to Thinkific, Teachable etc.
  • Feednext (‚≠ê326) - An open source social media application.
  • NextJS GOT (‚≠ê33) - Simple Next.js application that showcases Game of Thrones Characters.
  • Relate (‚≠ê334) - Mindfulness community - React, GraphQL, Next.js.
  • Password (‚≠ê120) - One password, right way.
  • Next Todos (‚≠ê130) - Todo list written in Next.js.
  • Hacker News (‚≠ê47) - Another Hacker News written in Next.js.
  • Jet Chat (‚≠ê10) - Jet and Next.js powered Chat demo.
  • Nextgram (‚≠ê51) - Sample Next.js v2 app for showing off its capabilities.
  • Rauchg Blog (‚≠ê1.3k) - Blog built by a Next.js core maintainer.
  • Next JPH (‚≠ê36) - JsonPlaceholder sample app made with Next.js.
  • Mailto (‚≠ê214) - HTML mailto's made easy.
  • Plate (‚≠ê49) - The task management app to rule them all.
  • Dashboard (‚≠ê1.3k) - Create your own team dashboard with custom widgets.
  • Snape (‚≠ê841) - A torrent client to search, stream and download torrents.
  • Trello Resume (‚≠ê16) - Converts trello data into fast read information.
  • Server Authentication with JWT (‚≠ê107) - Server authentication, prevent render before validation.
  • Alexander Kachkaev‚Äôs website ‚Äì personal homepage built with Next.js, GraphQL, Docker and Kubernetes. Uses apollo client, react-intl, styled-components and recompose. Docker images are automatically built by GitLab CI.
  • Cookie handler with server render (‚≠ê15) - Cookie handler with server render, access the cookie before render.
  • Gank (‚≠ê130) - A Next.js App use gank-api, mobx and antd
  • Decoupled CMS example with GraphQL and Next.js (‚≠ê30)
  • Mozilla VR Home - Mozilla VR Home
  • Elton John's website - Elton John's Website
  • IOTA's Data Market Place - IOTA Market Place
  • magicleap.com - Magic Leap
  • NPM.js Search Page - NPM's Search Page
  • Docker Success Center - Docker Success Center
  • Urteile & Gesetze (‚≠ê18) - German Legal Information System licensed under GPLv3.
  • TikTok's HomePage - TikTok's Home Page
  • njt.now.sh - npm jump to üê∏ (package navigation shortcuts you dreamed about). Partially statically-rendered, partially deployed as lambda. Automatically updated on each commit to the github repo (‚≠ê317), thanks to Now integration.
  • caseconverter.pro - A text case converter.
  • Tottem (‚≠ê978) - Bookmark manager on steroid built with NextJs / Auth0 / Apollo Tools / Prisma2
  • Slow TV Map - A fun way to discover relaxing virtual experiences. Next.js + Chakra UI + MySQL hosted on Vercel.

Books

  • Next.js Quick Start Guide - Create, build and deploy universal JavaScript applications using Next.js
  • The Next.js Handbook - Build a frontend React application that transparently handles server-side rendering for you.

Newsletters

  • Next.js News - Monthly Next.js newsletter showcasing new and upcoming features, best articles, tools, and plugins.
  • Next.js Notes - Monthly Next.js and JavaScript platform news.
entry.summary: 141 awesome projects updated on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022
